attributes.action: look into the unfair discrimination by delivery companies and couriers of higher postage costs to scottish highlands and islands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Online ordering of items to be delivered to off shore isles in scotland incurr additional surchages often as much as £45 when the same item delivered within the UK mainland is free. Quite often the online companies will not allow delivery through Royal Mail  which can be free. These companies wanted deregulation and now discriminate againest islanders.
